Package Control

Class MovieGoerMgr

java.lang.Object
Control.PersonMgr
Control.MovieGoerMgr
public class MovieGoerMgr
extends PersonMgr
This is a controller for all moviegoer module functions. It displays desired functionality based on user selection.
Functionality includes:
  • List movies (All, Top 5 by rating, Top 5 by Sales)
  • View movie details, reviews and ratings
  • Check seat availability and selection of seat/s.
  • Book and purchase ticket
  • View booking history
Author:
SS3 Group 8
See Also:
MovieGoerInterface

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> holidays, java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movies, java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookings, java.util.ArrayList<MovieShowing> movieShowings)
      Loads relevant data into this instance of MovieGoerMgr
      Initializes the following data:
      • Holidays
      • Movies
      • Bookings
      • Showtimes
      Parameters:
      holidays - ArrayList of the holiday dates
      movies - ArrayList of all movie information
      bookings - ArrayList of booking records
      movieShowings - ArrayList of showtimes

    • movieBooking

      public void movieBooking()
      Books movie ticket(s)
      Summary of method functionality:
      1. Lets user select desired movie
      2. Checks if ticket is available
      3. Asks user for desired showtime (if ticket is available)
      4. Asks user to choose seats
      5. Asks for user details (name, phone, email and age group)


      User can search for past bookings under his/her name

    • searchMovies

      public java.util.ArrayList<Movie> searchMovies()
      Search movies by name
      If user does not enter name and hits enter, displays all currently showing movies.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Movie objects

      public void listMoviesByRating()

      • End of Showing
      • Coming Soon

      • Shows with fewer than 2 reviews

      public Seat selectSeat​(MovieShowing movieShowing, int row, int col) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Select seat during booking
      Parameters:

      row - Row number of seat
      col - Column number of seat
      Returns:
      The seat selected
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • calculatePrice

      public double calculatePrice​(MovieShowing movieShowing, boolean discount)
      Calculate the price of tickets
      Ticket has a base price, final price depends on type of moviegoer
      Parameters:
      movieShowing - The movie user wants to book
      discount - Whether the movie goer can enjoy discount
      Returns:
      The final price of the ticket
